wikipedia.title: Madlib
wikipedia.extract: Otis Jackson Jr. (born October 24, 1973), known professionally as Madlib, is an American DJ, music producer, multi-instrumentalist, and rapper. One of the most prolific and critically acclaimed hip hop producers of the 2000s, he is widely known for his collaborations with MF DOOM (as Madvillain), J Dilla (as Jaylib), and Freddie Gibbs (as MadGibbs). Madlib has described himself as a "DJ first, producer second, and MC last."

opinions.details: 不过其实，这个madlib是指 那种填空的游戏。 一张纸上，给你一些文字，以及空格。在80年代很流行。
马德里布反而更好一点，中文里大家对马德里更熟悉
马德里三个字出来太干扰阅读了
